title: Building Production-Ready AI Agents
description: Join us for a deep dive into building scalable, production-ready AI agents. Learn best practices for error handling, observability, and deployment strategies.

title: Agent Memory Systems Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop exploring different memory architectures for AI agents. Build vector stores, semantic caches, and episodic memory systems.

title: AI Agent Hackathon 2026
description: 48-hour hackathon focused on building innovative AI agent applications. $50k in prizes, mentorship from industry leaders, and networking opportunities.

title: Agent Developer Meetup - San Francisco
description: Monthly meetup for AI agent developers in the Bay Area. Share your projects, learn from peers, and connect with the community over food and drinks.

title: MCP Protocol Deep Dive
description: Comprehensive overview of the Model Context Protocol. Learn how to build MCP servers and integrate them with your AI agents.

title: Agent Security Best Practices
description: Learn how to secure your AI agents against prompt injection, data leakage, and other security vulnerabilities. Includes practical exercises and code examples.

title: New Year Agent Builders Summit
description: Kick off the year with a community hackathon. Built 50+ new agent projects including autonomous research assistants, code review bots, and customer support agents.

title: Agent Developer Meetup - New York
description: Holiday meetup for AI agent developers in NYC. Celebrated the year's achievements and shared exciting plans for 2026.
